Introduction

Cotton Candy was a fictional project girl group that was created for the JTBC drama "Idol: The Coup".

According to the drama's plot, the group was under Starpeace Entertainment and consisted of five members: Jenna (played by EXID's Hani), Stella (actress Han So Eun), El (WJSN's EXY), Chae A (Red Square's Green. now known as I.L of IRRIS), and Hyunji (Laboum's Solbin). They made their debut on March 14, 2016 with the digital single "White Day". They were active from 2016 to 2021.
